review: I was able to get it for $20 when it was first released. Seems to work fairly quick (and that's without using external power!) and streams without any problems. It'd be worth getting at full price!
author: Goose

review: Easy to use and works great.
author: Emily R.

review: Quirky, needed several attempts to get it to work and download. The software that came with it is nearly plug & Play. With slower wireless networks, there is a buffer delay during Netflix streaming.
author: John Berezny

review: Great to use, easy and good reception. I love the Prime Movies for FREE.
author: Moe O.

review: Awesome item. This is the future of TV!
author: Brian A Kennedy

review: I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered the Fire TV Stick but even with my limited tech savvy I had it set up and running in no time.  With Amazon Prime the movies, tv, apps and games are virtually limitless.
author: Vickie rugamer
